what: chlorofluroR: In-house package to process CF imaging data
title: chlorofluroR: In-house package to process CF imaging data
text: R package -house analysis chlorophyll fluorescence data FluorCam FC800-331 FluorCam 7 Software. Based wet-lab protocol Long Lab. package compiled primarily aid plant selection, hence, plots CF results overlaps copy number data herbicide selection (ie. BASTA) results.

title: chlorofluroR: In-house package to process CF imaging data
text: Katie Jeynes-Cupper, University Illinois Urbana-Champaign, kejc@illinois.edu

title: chlorofluroR: In-house package to process CF imaging data
text: Overview Installation Input files Quick Start Output

title: chlorofluroR: In-house package to process CF imaging data
text: chlorofluoroR R package provides pipeline quick processing plotting CF imaging data specific parameters. , wish include/overlap copy number data (based BAR tag) BASTA selection. Get data analysed less 30 mins :)

title: chlorofluroR: In-house package to process CF imaging data
text: latest version package can install directly GitHub repo: Load package R library:

title: chlorofluroR: In-house package to process CF imaging data
text: See examples format input files: Plate layout Copy number results Data FluorCam software (frames-numeric) BASTA selection (smartsheets log)

title: chlorofluroR: In-house package to process CF imaging data
text: chlorofluoroR utilizes 96-well plate data. data can inputted single dataframe list dataframe (representing individual plate). output data FluorCam software requires wrangling - can help .

title: chlorofluroR: In-house package to process CF imaging data
text: First must load : - plate layouts - copy number results - Data FluorCam software (frames-numeric) - BASTA selection RUN CODE
code: data("CF_demodata") data("layout") data("selection_results") data("copynumber") output_location = tempdir() plate_names = names(CF_demodata) smartsheet = selection_results

what: 2. Computing the FvFm and PSII distribution
title: chlorofluroR: In-house package to process CF imaging data
text: function wrangles raw data FluorCam software, organises nice excel spreadsheet. excel doc separate sheets FvFm PSII data - specific plate. return list dataframes, plates dataframe FvFm PSII. saves excel file containing data (chlorofluoro_dataset_1.xlsx)pdf plot FvFm PSII (chlorofluoro_plot_1.pdf). plot line graph SD timepoint plant sample. colour sample determined BASTA selection results, green represents positive (ie. resistant) red represents negative (ie. resistant). line type determined copy number
code: step_one <- computeFvFm_PSII(CF_demodata,                                plate_names,                                layout,                                smartsheet,                               copynumber,                               output_location)

title: chlorofluroR: In-house package to process CF imaging data
text: want use data help us select lines carry T2. , filter desired traits. example, select copy number value 4 BASTA positive (ie. resistant). outputs plot excel document way compute_chlorofluor() function. See output files “chlorofluoro_plot_2.pdf” “chlorofluoro_dataset_2.xlsx”

what: 3. Summarise the FvFm and PSII values for each plant line.
title: chlorofluroR: In-house package to process CF imaging data
text: Instead looking distribution FvFm PSII multiple light pulses across time, can calculate mean. plot mean variables bar plot error bars representing SD. , colour determined BASTA selection result. Output also saved excel document (one sheet per plate variable). See output files “chlorofluoro_plot_3.pdf” “chlorofluoro_dataset_3.xlsx”

title: chlorofluroR: In-house package to process CF imaging data
text: three functions package outputs either excel file pdf ! end, likely files: - chlorofluoro_dataset_1.xlsx - chlorofluoro_dataset_2.xlsx - chlorofluoro_dataset_3.xlsx chlorofluoro_plot_1.pdf chlorofluoro_plot_2.pdf chlorofluoro_plot_3.pdf breakdown . chlorofluoro_dataset_1.xlsx Contains columns: - Plant_ID - Replicate - Selection - Timepoint - Time - BAR_copy - FvFm PhiPSII chlorofluoro_dataset_2.xlsx Contains columns: - plate - Plant_ID - Replicate - Selection - Timepoint - Time - BAR_copy - FvFm PhiPSII chlorofluoro_dataset_3.xlsx Contains columns: - Plant_ID - techreps - Selection - FvFm_Mean PSII_Mean - FvFm_SD PSII_SD Description plots: - chlorofluoro_plot_1.pdf: Chlorophyll fluorescence parameters Fv/Fm ΦPSII across genotypes transgene copy number.Line plots depict changes (left) maximum quantum efficiency PSII (Fv/Fm) (right) effective quantum yield PSII (ΦPSII) time (minutes). line represents mean value individual plant (distinguished color), grouped Plant ID. Colors represent BASTA selection result (green/positive red/negative). Line types denote transgene copy number (e.g., 0, 1, 2). Error bars represent standard error mean (SEM) time point. chlorofluoro_plot_2.pdf:Chlorophyll fluorescence parameters Fv/Fm ΦPSII across specific genotypes /transgene copy number. Line plots depict changes maximum quantum efficiency PSII (Fv/Fm) effective quantum yield PSII (ΦPSII) time (minutes). line represents mean value individual plant (distinguished color), grouped Plant ID. Colors represent BASTA selection result (green/positive red/negative). Line types denote transgene copy number (e.g., 0, 1, 2). Error bars represent standard error mean (SEM) time point. chlorofluoro_plot_3.pdf:Summary chlorophyll fluorescence parameters Fv/Fm ΦPSII across individual plants.Bar plots show mean values (left) Fv/Fm (maximum quantum efficiency PSII) (right) ΦPSII plant. bar represents average measurement individual plant, error bars indicating standard deviation (SD). Colors assigned based selection marker results (green/positive red/negative). Last updated: 06-25-2025

title: Compute distribution of FvFm and PSII. — computeFvFm_PSII
code: computeFvFm_PSII(   data,   plate_names,   layout,   smartsheet,   copynumber,   output_location,   width = 20,   height = 21 )

title: Compute distribution of FvFm and PSII. — computeFvFm_PSII
text: data data.frame list data.frame; FluorCam software (frames-numeric) plate_names character; name plates. layout data.frame list data.frame; plate layout. smartsheet data.frame; selection results, ie BASTA. copynumber data.frame; copy number results. output_location path; location save output files width numeric; pdf width size. deafult 20. height numeric;pdf height size. deafult 21.

title: Compute distribution of FvFm and PSII. — computeFvFm_PSII
text: Returns list dataframes, plates dataframe FvFm PSII. Saves excel file containing data plot FvFm PSII.

title: Compute distribution of FvFm and PSII. — computeFvFm_PSII
text: Takes input single dataframe list dataframe. Save data chlorofluoro_dataset_1.xlsx plots chlorofluoro_plot_1.pdf desired directory.

title: Compute distribution of FvFm and PSII. — computeFvFm_PSII
code: data("CF_demodata") data("layout") data("selection_results") data("copynumber")  output_location <-  tempdir() step_one <- computeFvFm_PSII(CF_demodata, plate_names = names(CF_demodata), layout, smartsheet = selection_results, copynumber, output_location) #> Data saved to /tmp/Rtmpgfgez7/chlorofluoro_dataset_1.xlsx #> Plots saved to /tmp/Rtmpgfgez7/chlorofluoro_plot_1.pdf #> Returned data

title: Summarise the FvFm and PSII values for each plant line. — summarise_chlorofluoro
code: data("step_one") data("selection_results") output_location <- tempdir() output_location <- "/Users/kejc/" step_three <- summarise_chlorofluoro(step_one, output_location) #> Joining with `by = join_by(Plant_ID)` #> Joining with `by = join_by(Plant_ID)` #> Joining with `by = join_by(Plant_ID)` #> Joining with `by = join_by(Plant_ID)` #> Joining with `by = join_by(Plant_ID)` #> Joining with `by = join_by(Plant_ID)` #> Joining with `by = join_by(Plant_ID)` #> Joining with `by = join_by(Plant_ID)` #> Warning: cannot create file '/Users/kejc//chlorofluoro_dataset_3.xlsx', reason 'No such file or directory' #> Data saved to /Users/kejc//chlorofluoro_dataset_3.xlsx #> Error in pdf(file.path(output_location, "chlorofluoro_plot_3.pdf"), width = width,     height = height): cannot open file '/Users/kejc//chlorofluoro_plot_3.pdf'
